title: CMS Experience
question: What is your experience working with content management systems?
shortDescription: Explore CMS platforms, headless vs traditional architectures, and how to articulate hands-on experience.

title: Proud Project
question: Tell us about a project you're particularly proud of and what work you did.
shortDescription: Learn to articulate project impact, technical decisions, and personal contributions.

title: CSS Methodologies
question: What CSS methodologies or frameworks have you used (e.g., BEM, Tailwind, Bootstrap)?
shortDescription: Compare BEM, SMACSS, Tailwind, and Bootstrap with real code examples and trade-offs.

title: CSS Specificity Debugging
question: How do you approach debugging CSS specificity issues?
shortDescription: Understand the cascade, specificity scoring, and systematic debugging strategies.

title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
question: Explain the difference between CSS Grid and Flexbox. When do you use which?
shortDescription: Master when to use Grid vs Flexbox with decision trees and live layout demos.

title: Debugging a Broken Site
question: What are your first steps to debug a website if it breaks during an update?
shortDescription: Step-by-step debugging methodology for broken deployments and updates.

title: HTML Accessibility
question: How do you ensure your HTML is accessible (WCAG compliant)? Describe the tools you use and any best practices to avoid WCAG errors.
shortDescription: WCAG compliance, ARIA attributes, semantic HTML, and accessibility testing tools.

title: Keeping Up With Tech
question: How do you keep up with new technologies or changes in web development?
shortDescription: Strategies for staying current with evolving web technologies and best practices.

title: Code Documentation
question: How do you document your code or communicate changes for team members?
shortDescription: Documentation practices, commit messages, PRs, and team communication strategies.

title: Enjoying Front-End Development
question: What do you enjoy most about front-end development?
shortDescription: Articulating your passion and what drives you in front-end work.

title: Complex UI/UX Problem
question: Describe a complex UI or UX problem you solved.
shortDescription: Frameworks for describing problem-solving processes and technical decision-making.

title: CMS Custom Modules
question: How do you approach creating custom modules or plugins for a CMS? Can you give an example of one you built?
shortDescription: Plugin architecture, hooks, APIs, and real examples of custom CMS extensions.

title: Theme Customization
question: What is your process for creating and customizing themes?
shortDescription: Theme development workflows, design tokens, starter themes, and customization strategies.

title: Production Bug Debugging
question: You deploy code to production and a user reports a bug, but you cannot reproduce it on your local machine. What do you do?
shortDescription: Strategies for reproducing and fixing environment-specific production bugs.
